item.title: Irina add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "You can never get a cup of tea large enough or a book long enough to suit me." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Irina add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "From the moment I picked your book up until I laid it down, I convulsed with laughter. Someday I intend on reading it." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Irina add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Irina add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Irina add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Reality continues to ruin my life." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Irina add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Irina add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Irina add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Irina add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Irina add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Irina add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Irina add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "You may not be her first, her last, or her only. She loved before she may love again. But if she loves you now, what else matters? She's not perfect—you aren't either, and the two of you may never be perfect together but if she can make you laugh, cause you to think twice, and admit to being human and making mistakes, hold onto her and give her the most you can. She may not be thinking about you every second of the day, but she will give you a part of her that she knows you can break—her heart. So don't hurt her, don't change her, don't analyze and don't expect more than she can give. Smile when she makes you happy, let her know when she makes you mad, and miss her when she's not there." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Irina add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "My music will go on forever. Maybe it's a fool say that, but when me know facts me can say facts. My music will go on forever." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Irina add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "Everytime I plant a seed,he say kill it before it grow, he say kill it before they grow." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Irina add a quote by Daniel O'Malley
item.description: "Checquy statistics indicate that 15 percent of all men in hats are concealing horns." -- Daniel O'Malley

item.title: Irina add a quote by Daniel O'Malley
item.description: "This duck tells me nothing!" -- Daniel O'Malley

item.title: Irina add a quote by Charles Stross
item.description: "Gene police! You! Out of the pool, now!" -- Charles Stross
